value.fullName: We are checking the document for plagiarism. Please wait for some time.
value.label: We are checking the document for plagiarism. Please wait for some time.

value.fullName: You will receive the update on plagiarism check by evening.
value.label: You will receive the update on plagiarism check by evening.

value.fullName: We are working on your document to remove plagiarism.
value.label: We are working on your document to remove plagiarism.

value.fullName: Please provide us the requirements of the professor.
value.label: Please provide us the requirements of the professor.

value.fullName: Please pay the amount so that we can deliver the work to you as soon as possible.
value.label: Please pay the amount so that we can deliver the work to you as soon as possible.
